website_summaries.verdict: There's a lot to like about the Nikon Coolpix P100, but you'll need to keep your photo quality expectations in check to really enjoy it.
pros: very fast shooting performance for its class
cons: Photo, video quality is weakest part of the package

customer_reviews.title: Good and Reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera in May 2010 and I am still using it. I purchased an extra battery to make sure I always have one charged and ready. It takes wonderful photos. I've used it mostly for birding and closeups. It was well worth the money and is still working great. So glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera, I loved it
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera, I loved it, the zoom amazing, you can see the moon like in front of you and even see the crates, is better use with flash, because take a little time to get the picture and focus, without blur, but good camera after all
customer_reviews.author: Helberth

customer_reviews.title: Good camera overall, but not great at either function
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited when I got this camera, I didn't have any unrealistic expectations. I still like the camera I just wish it was just a bit better. One of the problems I've found is the lighting issues, it always seems like I'm re-taking pictures due to lighting. Don't get me wrong, it takes good pictures 90% of the time. The video could be a lot better, the lighting problems are really noticeable when your recording video. I was expecting better resolution out of an "HD" video recorder. Overall good camera that will serve you well if you have to carry light, but will not replace a good camera and good video camera.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Hard to believe its a cool pic
customer_reviews.text: This is the most incredible camera can't believe its a cool pic. Seems to do anything a digital SLR can do but easier I learn something new about it each time I use it ,,,it's way beyond a simple point n shoot like the mini cool pics that Nikon makes the 24 x zoom catches any detail u want to hone in on then project in on ur fav big screen tv wow!! Don't think it's still in production but find on eBay ,,I gave just under. 400 on amazon bout 2 years ago know it well now.. 4 stars cuz only God gets five !!!
customer_reviews.author: Peteran

customer_reviews.title: Digital SLR like cameras are great but have strengths and weaknesses
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great for decently high quality photographs. The best feature was that it has an actual viewfinder. This is nice if you have older eyes and can't make out the LCD screen in harsh sunlight conditions. I'm old and old school and like having a viewfinder even for snapshots. Admittedly I'm more likely to just grab ye olde smartphone these days for snapshots because it's conveniently handy.
customer_reviews.author: JacK Trades

customer_reviews.title: Really Like This
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to learn to use an SLR, but wanted something with similar quality. This fits the bill. I still have to get out the user's guide before doing any serious pictures (I am tech challenged). But even set on full auto, I get really good pictures in various settings, even at night. This model will probably not be available much longer. But I can recommend getting a Nikon bridge type for just about anybody.
customer_reviews.author: Okie CatFan

customer_reviews.title: Fabian
customer_reviews.text: I always enjoy buying from amozon, never had a problem with shipping, nor customer service. The camera works and operates great. Also very light weight. I have no issues with the zoom, its is more thsn enough. The only issuse i have is auto focus. When you are indoors, the objects have to be supper still because you will have lots of blurry pics. I tried diffrent option an still have blurry pics...maybe its a setting? I cant figure it out? I have had a cannon before and the quality is just as good. I think i'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy

customer_reviews.title: Camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It has everything i was looking for. It takes beautiful pictures. I have not had any issues with it. Battery life is great. I ordered extra batteries as reserve but i have never found that i was constantly chaging the camera. I am not a professional photographer but this camera makes me feel like one. It has so many advanced features that a regular camera does not have. This is a wise choice for a good camera.
customer_reviews.author: ruggy35

customer_reviews.title: Love This Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great camera that produces remarkably good pictures. I have rather large hands, and the camera is very comfortable to hold; with conveniently positioned controls. Anyone using it, however, should keep the 200-page instruction manual nearby. It makes a big difference if you understand the many useful settings and features. About the only disappointing feature so far has been the microphones that pick up camera-handling noises, operator breathing, and lens zoom.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Great all around camera. Im a house inspector and take 100's of shots in each house I inspect. Since I purchased this camera in 2011 I have probably taken 10,000 or more photos with it. Im not a photo tech guy but out of the box this camera has performed great. Im retiring it to upgrade to a Coolpix that gives a higher optical zoom but it will remain as my backup camera till it breaks. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Livin the Dream

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good camera for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this camera. It's not a DSLR and should not be compared to one. If you don't want to be bothered with carrying a big camera bag loaded with different lenses then you will like this camera. It handles a variety of shooting situations with ease and if you read the manual, and practice, you can take some excellent shots. I am happy with my purchase and have recommended this camera and Amazon to many of my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzi Taylor

customer_reviews.title: sold my P300 for this one
customer_reviews.text: I originally had the P300. Loved the lcd screen and small size, but the limited 4.2X zoom really bothered me. With the P100's 26X zoom, I was able to shoot some nice portraits with lovely bokeh (blurry backgrounds) by utilizing the zoom. I also liked the smile timer, which automatically takes a picture when the camera detects a smile. A very nice feature, as I don't have to run back and reset the timer as usual. I don't have anything bad to say about the P100, as it gives me pretty much everything I want.
customer_reviews.author: Lassokid

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This camera was a Christmas gift for my wife. She had been hinting that she wanted a camera with a decent zoom and fairly high megapixels. I researched several models and trusted the Nikon name. It is provides nice, crisp pictures of our children and many other events. We have been very pleased with the zoom, and quite surprised at how well it functions. As always, Amazon had the best price I could find.
customer_reviews.author: JByrd71

customer_reviews.title: Great camera with awesome zoom
customer_reviews.text: This camera works great, and the zoom is awesome and exactly what the doctor ordered. I was sick of going to school functions and getting awful pictures of the school band and my kids. With this camera, I could zoom right into my child and get all sorts of nice pictures. Sure, I've had better cameras, but they've been 10x more expensive as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill_OKC

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera,Nikon's Best Yet
customer_reviews.text: The day I got my P-100 Coolpix,I wanted to see how much better it was than the P-80,that I used everyday for my work.I'm a Construction Inspector working outside everyday,so there are so many things in nature that I see & take pictures of.So now to the Coolpix P100,all of the settings are great,I'm working this camera with no trouble,great in the hands,quick with taking pictures no waiting for the next shot.The pictures are great in detail & color from the center to the edges.Of the six years of using the P-series cameras by Nikon.Nikon has really done good with this one,five stars & then some
customer_reviews.author: Keith Baty

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera because it has a viewfinder to look ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera because it has a viewfinder to look through not just a big window that you can't see in the sun. It came with a case but no directions. I will try to download them. But it is pretty easy to use even for me.
customer_reviews.author: J S Deran

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P100
customer_reviews.text: I travel 75% of the year and wanted the quality and versatility of a DSLR with excellent zoom and macro capabilities, but without the weight and added need for extra lenses. This camera meets my needs perfectly. I can use the many auto options or go with manual controls. The zoom is amazing, I can get upclose to wildlife without them knowing and beautiful macro shots showing excellent details of insects or vegetation. I'm still learning all the possibilities available and am continually pleased with the outcomes.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy1218

customer_reviews.title: Love this camera
customer_reviews.text: It works so much better if you take the time to read the instructions. It even worked pretty well when I didn't read the instructions. I am a real rookie regarding cameras so I really needed to practice with it and I am still having fun trying new things. Took great pictures on my trip to Belize and Israel.
customer_reviews.author: bzlady414

customer_reviews.title: Great Packable Camera
customer_reviews.text: I have had a sample of just about everything from Nikon from the 60's on save the costly D3 series and I really like this one for general use if I don't need my DSLRs. My only disappointment is that the HS 120fps is only good for 40 seconds of playback. For those times instead I use my Casio Exilim FH100 for its 45 minutes of playback.
customer_reviews.author: fiddler

customer_reviews.title: Nikon p100 is Cool
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this camera now for about 1 month. I have played with the settings and taken a lot of pictures and some video. The still shots are definitely great, in almost any lighting, and even at long distance. The action shots are much better than previous point-and-shoot cameras, but still have some blur. I use the action mode and later delete unclear and unneeded pictures on my PC. It now takes more time to sift through all the pictures I have taken than before because of this. I recommend the p100 to anyone who is looking to upgrade from a pocket camera. The controls and instructions are straight forward and intuitive, the picture quality superior.
customer_reviews.author: NKC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, i love the ease of using it, excellent quality
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Kurapka

customer_reviews.title: A great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little camera but don't take out the card while it is turned on or it may burn it out and I don't think it can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce E. Webster

customer_reviews.title: disappointing photo quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in this camera. I was replacing a five year old Canon and thought this would be a step up in quality. After a few uses, I wish I had stayed with Canon. This camera is cumbersome to handle, and the flimsy plastic parts may not last under frequent use. The view screen cannot be seen under sunny conditions, a huge drawback. The worst of it is that the image quality is poor, very blurry no matter how the photo is shot. Maybe an ungraded SD card would help, but I hesitate to put any more money into a product which didn't produce acceptable results.
customer_reviews.author: VTgrandma

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P100
customer_reviews.text: A lightweight, easy to use, camera which allows we inexperienced photographers some feel as to features available in more expensive equipment. Stabilization when using zoom I find fantastic. Would prefer a longer lifetime for the battery but don't have much of a basis to compare.
customer_reviews.author: avocet

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely wonderful...
customer_reviews.text: I am a click and shoot kind of guy. Had a Canon AE1 25 years ago - adjust this, set the F stop, focus, change lens - NOT anymore. Went from a small Sony click and shoot to this Nikon P100. Love it. Does everything a more expensive SLR camera does and does it automatically.
customer_reviews.author: J. DiGiovanna

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pictures and easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera because I needed excellent quality pictures in the simplest way to maneuver. I have 4 kids so I didn't have time to learn a lot of complicated functions. I have been very pleased!!! I also take pictures for the schools yearbook and I am so happy with the results. Lastly, I wanted to take pictures in the icerink which can be dark at times. The pictures have been great there too!
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Newer model is better
customer_reviews.text: by the time i wrote this the difference between P100 and P510 was $30, if you want to save that its ok the P100 has very good quality, zoom and everything else but the P510 is much,much better.
customer_reviews.author: Berny

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera. It has what I need and what I was expecting. I didn't get any of the reported errors and have been taking tons of pictures and videos(hope 240fps size videos could be bigger). I really recommend this camera!!! *I uploaded some pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Omar C.

customer_reviews.title: Bought it for video
customer_reviews.text: and I wasn't disappointed. Shoots great at 1080p and even better slo-mo video. Get used to lense cap removal when using playback. And that's the only thing they messed up on. The tilt display is perfect for action video. Battery life is good. Overall, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: snoop

customer_reviews.title: One month user
customer_reviews.text: After one month, found the camera to do everything they said it would do. Great pictures so far after approximately 500 taken in many different lighting and distances situations.
customer_reviews.author: W. Medley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera - truly market leader
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a friend, who is absolutely stunned by the performance of this camera. It has great low-light performance. The daylight photos are as usual legendary Nikon quality. I'll give 10/10 to this marvelous camera. And 26x optical zoom - that just blew all other competitors away!
customer_reviews.author: Souvik Sinha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, totally satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with my new camera, the only complaint I have is the camera case it came in, I would of prefered a better one, a bit larger, to hold all the cords and the book, as well as the camera.
customer_reviews.author: ME2CARE4

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Nikon Coolpix P100 about a month ago and have enjoyed it tremendously! The quality of the pictures is very clear and does a great job at taking macro pictures. I haven't really used the video yet so I can't say how well it does. From what I have seen though it does a great job. Over all its really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: August28

customer_reviews.title: nikon coolpix P100 Digital camera
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy, You can't beat a Nikon Camera and you can't beat the price at Amazon, Thanks Amazon for quality products at a fantastic price! Truly a 5 star rating for Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: betty of MS

customer_reviews.title: superior quality snaps and value for money
customer_reviews.text: I purchases this camera after going through various reviews on websites. Looked at the sample pictures. I am satisfied with kind of features it offers in this range. I am not expert but I can say this camera has lot of features for people who are not expert photographers but expect more from a point and shoot. I like the 26x zoom but close-up or portrait photos are also impressive.
customer_reviews.author: Natekar P

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money and great for low light conditions
customer_reviews.text: The zoom is amazing on this camera, 27x! Good performance in low light conditions, overall it is good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: agranados777

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love my camera! It takes professional quality photos and it never lets me down.
customer_reviews.author: starr

customer_reviews.title: Over all, a good buy
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use controls, 3" LCD is great, nice single lens wide-angle to 26x zoom capability without much distortion. Quality of outdoor pictures are terrific. Only negative I have found so far is that low light pictures are not very good - indoor shots need lots of light; flash is not enough.
customer_reviews.author: ol' Henry

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix 100
customer_reviews.text: Bought the camera to use on vacation and was very impressed with its ease of use. Quality you would explect in a Nikon. Light and easy to carry. Zoom is great and very handy to have.
customer_reviews.author: Gardner Bob

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - Full Featured Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is great. My family has been looking for a camera better then a typical point and shoot and not as bulky/expensive as a DSLR. What we found was the Coolpix P100. The camera has a set of amazing features and an excellent zoom. I used the camera at a graduation as well as at some sporting events and the modes work well. The sport shooting captured clear pictures of people in motion which is one of our favorite features along with the zoon. Definitely would recommend this camera!
customer_reviews.author: G. Aurigemma

customer_reviews.title: grate camera
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. I'm a sailor who loves to take pictures while on the open water. Quick response, maximum zoom and stability are a must when sea creature are playing on the horizon. The P100 delivers. Rarely do I miss a shoot. It not unusual for me to take 100 to 200 pictures while sailing. Summary. I appreciate a camera that does it's job while I'm focused on the shot. Memories made easy is what this camera is about.
customer_reviews.author: jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Great value for US$300
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a small point-and-shoot but lately I wanted to have more control over the results... this camera has a fully manual mode, great zoom and image quality is great (in my not professional opinion)... so I guess it's a very good product for those who are trying to go a bit further in their photos but without the "hassle" of heavy cameras and interchangeable lenses
customer_reviews.author: darful84

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I've used every option and it's good enough for me; have had it several years now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Only worked for about a year. Battery wouldn't stay charged and the lens cap didn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: t0rman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the pice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my friend, and he seems to love it. I liked the LCD display. It is pretty cool what you can do with it.
customer_reviews.author: razorPi

customer_reviews.title: Great shooter:)
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I'd like a fixed lens, but this one really surprised me and I take it everywhere. The 600+ magnification is great!:)
customer_reviews.author: jla

customer_reviews.title: I really like
customer_reviews.text: As a beginner on this type of camera I've had it for over a month and am still learning. I haven't had any problems that I didn't cause myself. The manual is very helpful. I read all the negative reviews on the camera before I bought it and have not experienced any yet. I had been told by an experienced photo instructor it was a good camera for the price I could afford.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Q

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P100 Digital Camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful camera, very easy to use. The feature I feally love is it takes color and black and white photos at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: tom2tess

customer_reviews.title: good camera for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I own a Sony DSC too but this has better zoom than the other and cheaper too. I would recommend this product if you are not looking for a SLR but need a camera with a good zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband for Christmas and he loved it! I was torn between this and a Canon, since our previous camera was a Canon. However, I'm very happy with this purchase, and so is the hubby. It's very easy to use, and all the features are great.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Item at a Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine used for $120. It came in like new, with no problems. It's been to two different countries, and the pictures have been of excellent quality. I honestly couldn't have asked for anything better!
customer_reviews.author: H. Hartman

customer_reviews.title: Nice Camera
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera due to the excellent ratings in Consumers Reports magazine and so far I have been happy with it. It has many more controls than my old camera so I am still learning all the features and what it will do.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Phil

customer_reviews.title: Photography
customer_reviews.text: I needed something small and powerful, something that had a view finder and a long zoom. I use it mainly for video's because my other camera only has 640 definition and this one has 1080HD
customer_reviews.author: dwight dills

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P 100
customer_reviews.text: Had a Nikon Coolpix P 80. Love the P 80 camera and wanted to upgrade. Telephoto lens is amazing. Haven't learned all the "new" bells and whistles just yet but love what I have. Easy to carry in a waistpack and quick to use. Great for close ups and scenery and everything in between.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Birder

customer_reviews.title: very good camera, very happy with the results
customer_reviews.text: The bottom line is that everything I wanted a great photo of I did get. great lake shots, full moon and 1/4 moon shots..with all craters showing excellent shadows, The first snow photo's were wonderful...This camera makes me look like a professional. RJ
customer_reviews.author: RJ photography

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera- i like it
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with my decision to buy this camera. It has very good picture quality, good controls, excellent zoom, adjustable screen. In addition to good pictures, the video recording quality is excellent. I would recommend this camera to all.
customer_reviews.author: PSengar

customer_reviews.title: Cheap junk
customer_reviews.text: I had this camera for about half an hour before returning it. I took a few pics and some video. The picture quality is terrible. Every shot was either under or over exposed, or not focused. After about 10 photos the lens froze while zoomed out. It is on it's way back to Amazon. I don't know what to do now. I thought this was "the one". I'm looking at a Finepix HS10 but I'm not sure about that one either. It seems the cameras in this category with the best reviews are way over priced. Back to the 'ole drawing board.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best camera in the world!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best cameras in the world i just love it so much The movable screen is like the coolest feature The 10 mp is so clear Nice macro Fast picture taking Long lasting lastes me bout 2 days I dont know a camera i can get better then this
customer_reviews.author: Camera luver

customer_reviews.title: Simply Great!
customer_reviews.text: I buy this camera for a friend, and the status is Perfect! He is hapy with your new camera, all funtionalities are amazing, 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Andres Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: very good camera
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. I have been using a 7 megapixel point & shoot camera, but couldn't get clear pics during night. Then I went for Nikon P100. P100 works very good. It has rechargable battery, HD video, 26x zoom and very powerful flash.
customer_reviews.author: Nikhil R. Bhandari

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix P100
customer_reviews.text: We bought this camera for our daughter who has been enjoying an a photography class in school. It takes some great pictures and has good features and adjustability yet is easy to use. We may borrow it for a better vacation camera.
customer_reviews.author: nsoenk

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I really loved this camera. It has a lot of useful and nice features, and its manual helps to understand and use them. I took really good pictures and excellent fullHD videos! I just faced two problems that i couldn't solve till now: 1. Depending of the light is difficult to obtain focus, but it could be my fault, 'cause I'm still learning about the camera; 2. While I was recording a fullHD video was difficult to get focus when i use the zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Alternate for my SLR
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but versitle, can't wait to take on a trip soon to try it out. Reviewed many "like" cameras and had purchased Olympus 590 for daughter, freind has Canon equivilant, hope this is even beter. Mostly tired of carrying all the weight of the SLR and lenses on trips so decided to give this a try and still have telephoto capability, so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: KatCat

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this anytime anyday.
customer_reviews.text: Oh how i wish it was Christmas again, where i can purchase as gifts for my family so they can experience how great this camera works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sorry but couldn't keep it...
customer_reviews.text: Many things went OK but 2 were enough to led me to let it go... 1) Got the camara with expectation... I turned it ON... first message on the screen... "ERROR"... WHAT???!!! Then I realized that I was forced to take off the cap to continue, even if we just wanted to review photos taken. It makes no sense! UNACCEPTABLE for a camera of that range of price and that is supposedly high tech. 2) The battery charger included works connecting the camera with the battery inside. This forces you to leave the camera aside, being unable to take photos with another battery while charging. Very inconvenient. I bought the Lumix FZ40 and I'm so happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: JPRiquezes

customer_reviews.title: Nikon collpix p100
customer_reviews.text: I really love this camera, it was easy to learn most of the features. The picture quality was excellent. The only thing that disapointed me was the video/recording feature. In the paly back mode the sound is very low.
customer_reviews.author: Loucob

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my camera. The macro setting on this camera is incredible. I still have a lot to learn and I personally believe this is the camera to do it with.
customer_reviews.author: Gail L. Singer

customer_reviews.title: Converting from 35mm to digital
customer_reviews.text: Have had the camera for only a month. I feel the picture quality is excellent and the weight is much better than my 35mm that it replaced. Look forward to learning and using all of the functions of the camera in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Richmond Virginia

customer_reviews.title: nikon p100
customer_reviews.text: I am still in search for a very fast and sharp camera. Nikon p100 is light and takes ok pictures but still not covering up my expectations. It is good with still pictures. But while on move or spontaneous photos they come out blurry. has many functions but makes you lose time while setting the right mode. ý have a tiny casio and ý am sad to write that it is x3 faster and almost the same picture quality. battery goes only for a day if you use is wisely. so ý d suggest to carry extra battery.
customer_reviews.author: Gunay Arslan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera!
customer_reviews.text: I have the p80 and my daughter wanted a camera like it so I decided to get her the p100 for Christmas. She loves it! It has alot of cool features especially the sport mode and the zoom is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wright

customer_reviews.title: Renee
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Nikon p100 for myself because I like to take pictures. I love it. It is light weight has all the features I want. The pictures are very clear. And it is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Barber

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: My nikon coolpix p100 10mp great camera and not for the big bucks dealer was right on his description thanks. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Irene Stapleford

customer_reviews.title: great camera
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT camera, it's just that I happened to receive a defective one! The memory card slot would not recognize any memory cards so we had to send it back. Fortunately Amazon is very good about their returns. They immediately emailed me a UPS label to return my defective camera and are shipping me another one! Hopefully I'll be able to get the full experience of how great this camera can be when I can put a memory card in it and take more than 15 pictures at a time!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT CAMERA
customer_reviews.text: GREAT CAMERA! BOUGHT THIS CAMERA FOR MY WIFE AND SHE REALLY LOVES IT. THE ZOOM IS REALLY NICE. SHE SAYS THIS ONE IS A KEEPER.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Super Zoom
customer_reviews.text: i purchesed this product on blackfriday deal. i think spending $300 dollars for 26X zoom, wide angle is very reasonable, i recommend people to use tripod to take fully zoomed pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Radha Lavakrishnan

customer_reviews.title: I love this camera.
customer_reviews.text: This camera has exceeded all my expectations. I had looked at the Canon. But after hours of research, the Nikon seemed to be better. I am so glad I got the Nikon.
customer_reviews.author: jrhalpha

customer_reviews.title: Fine camera
customer_reviews.text: After a month I have discovered the multiple settings this camera has, sometimes I get out of focus pics but most of pics taken are fine, the more time you spend playing with the camera the better pics you can take.
customer_reviews.author: J. Arce Araya

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. Photos are great, even when I'm still learning it features. Great zoom you can see every detail w/ excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: lcdecaribe

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing, simple to use for starters and just over great features for the more experienced. The zoom on this has came in handy to make some really amazing wildlife pics and videos are just a huge bonus added in.
customer_reviews.author: Alec

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: A good camera for the price you pay. Great features for the price, but compromise on the photo quality. HD video are Pros. Worth the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: P. Sethuramalingam

customer_reviews.title: Washed out pictures, impossible to control vibration at large zoom
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item after playing with it for a while. Immediately noticed that the pictures are washed out, much lower quality than my Canon. The picture appears better temporarily while focusing but then loses color. Plus, I really struggled with taking pics with high zoom. Almost all my pics had unacceptably high vibration even when I used it sitting down on objects within the room.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to use little Nikon
customer_reviews.text: What drew me to this Nikon is the electronic viewfinder. It enables you to compose your pic without the shake of the screen. Very nicely done Nikon!
customer_reviews.author: roberge

customer_reviews.title: My camera
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with my new camera. Is a great camera, not a professional one, but have everything I need to take my family pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Claudio Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Improved version of the P90. Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: This bridge camera works pretty well in almost every condition that you need to take a picture... Face pictures, scenery, dawn, dusk, even sports or slow motions vids... This camera has given me very good results in terms of photo quality, control of its functions and shoot speed (especially when you need a quick photo.) If I have to say something bad about this camera .... Video recording is not its strongest point though the video quality works very well, but if you want good pictures, excellent zoom with a stabilizer that works very well, wide angle ... This camera is for you. It have a good price too... P.S. my english is bad... sorry ;)
customer_reviews.author: Rony

customer_reviews.title: I'm Happy with this Camera
customer_reviews.text: The review's that I read before purchasing this camera were very helpful. This is my 2nd Nikon.Once again, I am NOT disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoFan

customer_reviews.title: I dont know!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave to my wife... I never touched in this camera :(, just bought and gave to her!!! I have an other... can be rated...smaller than Nikon...
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Zequim

customer_reviews.title: Coolpix P100 - A bargain
customer_reviews.text: For all its qualities and low price, Coolpix P100 is indeed a good bargain. Just loved it as an amateur photographer.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Not Disapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Finally replacing my Canon T70 SLR with this Nikon P100. This is definitely a step up! Love it! No regrets!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Evalt

customer_reviews.title: Fantatstic caemra
customer_reviews.text: At first I chose the Nikon Coolpix for price. When I started to use it found it to be a wonderful and first rate digital camera. It is a wonderful addition to my collection. I use it almost daily!
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: My best so far.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great camera for the money...very well rated by my known non-profit agency... the zoom is super.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Tremblay

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, easy to use, but you need to read first the manual to get excelent pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Seco

customer_reviews.title: higher than my expectations!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is over my expectations! Is lighter than I tought it would be, the battery life is long and the pictures quality is really good. About the price, I can say that is totally worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: one
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the camera as a whole: focusing system, picture definition, ergonomics, menue system, flash system,quality of pictures, telescopic system. i rate the camera as excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G. Detwiler, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera, greater zoom!
customer_reviews.text: I waited for months for this camera and it is worth it. The zoom lens is great when it comes to the shots I take
customer_reviews.author: Joyce L. Scuderi

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This camera was advertised as "new" when in fact it was used!
customer_reviews.author: Bonny K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the benefit of a price deduction when the price dropped ten dollars before the camera shipped. so what do you want credit for? P.S. ( The camera is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Willie F.

customer_reviews.title: Nikon cool Pix 100
customer_reviews.text: I have experminted with this camera quite a bit and so far i am quite pleased with the quality and most of the features,for it's size it is a great back up camera
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Nikon Coolpix p100
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for my 14 year old son and he absolutley loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Chandonnet

customer_reviews.title: Nikon P100 Review
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Camera. A bit complex features however photo quality makes you forget all negatives. A bit scope for improvement in MACRO mode. Otherwise I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Aditya

customer_reviews.title: What a great camera!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is easy to use and produces great photos. I am extremely pleased with its performance!!
customer_reviews.author: Stafford Conley

product_meta.title: Nikon Coolpix P100 10 MP Digital Camera with 26x Optical Vibration Reduction (VR) Zoom and 3-Inch LCD (Black) (OLD MODEL)
product_meta.description:
Zoom closer, shoot faster, and do more with Nikon's Coolpix P100, with its new CMOS sensor, 10.3 effective megapixels and incredible 26x optical Zoom-Nikkor ED glass lens. The cameras huge bright 3.0-inch high-resolution HVGA (460k-dot) vari-angle LCD and Electronic Viewfinder makes it easy to compose and share your pictures. Shoot Full HD (1080i) video with stereo sound as well as high-speed 10fps shooting at full resolution.Nikon's 5-way VR Image Stabilization System takes incredible pictures, incredibly easy. Nikon's Smart Portrait System automatically detects your subjects face , takes a picture when they smile, smooth out skin tones and warns you if they blinked.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


 Zoom closer, shoot faster, and do more with Nikon's Coolpix P100, with its new CMOS sensor, 10.3 effective megapixels and incredible 26x optical Zoom-Nikkor ED glass lens. The cameras huge bright 3.0-inch high-resolution HVGA (460k-dot) vari-angle LCD and Electronic Viewfinder makes it easy to compose and share your pictures. Shoot Full HD (1080i) video with stereo sound as well as high-speed 10fps shooting at full resolution. 

Nikon's 5-way VR Image Stabilization System takes incredible pictures, incredibly easy. Nikon's Smart Portrait System; automatically detects your subjects face, takes a picture when they smile, smooth out skin tones and warns you if they blinked. 

True versatility with a 26x optical zoom, 26mm wide-angle capability, and superb image quality 

Coolpix P100, a new compact digital camera model that offers an impressive focal range, wide-angle coverage, and exceptional image quality. Incorporating the precision optics of a Nikkor lens and the image quality benefits of Nikon's innovative EXPEED digital image-processing concept, the Coolpix P100 is a tool that brings flexibility and fun to photography. 

A new 26x zoom, Nikkor ED glass lens for the Coolpix P100 covers a broad focal range of 26mm wide-angle through 678mm super-telephoto (35mm format equivalent). It even covers macro shooting ability from as close as 1 cm (0.4 in.). The compositional freedom of this versatile reach and range is further enhanced by a 3-inch vari-angle high resolution Clear Color Display that can be tilted as much as 90 degrees upward or 82 degrees downward. 




Nikon Coolpix P100 Feature Highlights 

EXPEED digital imaging technology
Nikon's smarter approach to digital imaging technology. From image capture to processing, Nikon's comprehensive EXPEED digital imaging concept encompasses the entire picture-taking operation. EXPEED is much more than a processing engine; it is a revolution in digital photography. 

Backside illumination CMOS sensor for advanced performance 
The Coolpix P100 enables images of exceptional quality even when shooting in night scenes or in dark indoor situations. Thanks to the new backside illumination CMOS sensor, which increases the amount of light that each pixel receives, resulting in improved sensitivity and noise reduction. 

The advanced performance of the new CMOS image sensor brings in-camera Backlit Scene HDR (High Dynamic Range) imaging to the Coolpix P100. HDR merges some images of the same scene to create an image with a range of tonal detail that could not be captured in a single photo. Night Landscape mode also benefits from a function that combines a series of consecutive shots taken at a fast shutter speed into a single, clearer image when taking handheld shots at night. Further extending its potential as a versatile photographic tool, the Coolpix P100 features high-speed shooting. This capability allows users to shoot consecutive images in maximum size 3648 x 2736 (10M) at a rapid 10-fps (approx.). Other high-speed options include Sport Continuous Mode (120-fps) and Pre-shooting Cache. 

3-inch vari-angle 460k-dot TFT LCD featuring Nikon's Clear Color Display and electronic viewfinder 
In addition to its 3-inch high-resolution vari-angle LCD featuring Clear Color Display with anti-reflection coating, the Coolpix P100 features the versatility of an electronic viewfinder that further enhances compositional freedom and accuracy under all lighting conditions. The vibrant 3.0-inch 460k-dot VGA display offers twice the clarity and detail of standard cameras for stunning image reproduction. 

High-Definition movie recording 
Entertain audiences with movies that capture the entire impact of the scene with Full HD. The Coolpix P100 can shoot up to 2 hours* of Full HD movies (1080p) with stereo sound with its conveniently positioned Movie-record button. Both the camera's optical zoom and autofocus functions continue to be available while filming. A stereo microphone optimally mounted on top of the camera accurately captures audio. The HS movie function provides the added benefit of recording movies that can be played back in slow motion or fast motion.
*Recording stops automatically after 29 minutes. This figure is based on in-house testing standards and stated for recording at 25°C with a fully charged EN-EL5 battery. Actual results may vary greatly depending on factors that include differences in ambient temperature, and the amount of zoom and autofocus operations used. 



Five advanced image stabilizing features* help ensure sharper results 
Compensating for the effects of camera shake to realize sharper results and contribute to a more reassuring shooting experience, Image sensor shift and Electronic VR (Vibration Reduction) frees you to enjoy capturing special moments without worrying about slight hand movements. High ISO 3200 capability at any image size up to its maximum of 3648 x 2736 pixels allows faster shutter speeds when shooting in low light or capturing fast-moving subjects. Motion Detection automatically controls shutter speed and the ISO setting to compensate for subject movement as well as camera shake. And, Nikon's original BSS (Best Shot Selector) function automatically shoots a series of sequential frames and saves the one with the sharpest focus. 
* The camera selects and uses only the features required to optimize each image. 



Nikon's Smart Portrait System with Skin Softening 
As part of Nikon's Smart Portrait System, a series of advanced functions help produce consistently great portraits. The Skin Softening function ensures smooth skin tone on the face of subjects by leveraging built-in face-detection technology. Automatically detecting as many as 12 faces in the shot, Face-priority AF helps produce satisfying portraits by adjusting focus and exposure. Smile Timer helps to faithfully record precious moments by automatically releasing the shutter when the subject smiles. Blink Warning alerts the photographer when it suspects that a subject has blinked, while the Blink Proof function shoots five sequential frames, then saves the one in which the subject's eyes are wide open. In-Camera Red-Eye Fix Red-Eye Fix automatically corrects perceived red-eye effect before saving the image to memory. 


Four exposure modes P, S, A and M 
The Mode Dial provides quick access to the rich creative possibilities offered by advanced Programmed Auto [P], Shutter-priority Auto [S], Aperture-priority Auto [A], and Manual [M] exposure modes. 

Innovative Active D-Lighting function 
Enabled during shooting, Active D-Lighting is a unique technology that adds light and detail where necessary while leaving correctly exposed areas untouched to produce significantly improved images with a more natural-looking finish. 



Nikon Coolpix P100 Other Features  * 17 scene modes for optimized shooting in various settings 
 * Scene Auto Selector 
 * Subject Tracking 
 * Optimize image (including monochrome filter effect) 
 * Active Zoom 
 * 1:1 size format 
 * Distortion Control 
 * Quick Retouch 
 * Approx. 43 MB of internal memory 
 * USB charging via Charging AC Adapter EH-68P/EH-68P (AR) or PC 
 * HDMI connectivity 

What's in the Box  * EN-EL5 Rechargeable Li-ion Battery 
 * EH-68P AC Adapter/Charger 
 * UC-E6 USB Cable 
 * EG-CP14 Audio Video Cable 
 * AN-CP21 Strap 
 * Coolpix Software Suite CD-ROM
feature_bullets: 5-way VR Image Stabilization System and Smart Portrait System
Full 1080p HD movie recording at 30fps and HDMI output
26x wide-angle optical zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens
10.3 megapixels for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches and backside illumination CMOS sensor
Bright 3.0-inch vari-angle high resolution HVGA Clear Color Display
10.3 megapixels for stunning prints as large as 16 x 20 inches; backside illumination CMOS sensor
26x wide-angle optical zoom-NIKKOR ED glass lens
